name: Astosis
text:
Good evening, [Player]-kun.
Thank you for responding to my sudden summons.

name: Astosis
text:
My affairs have finally settled down.
Although it's under the supervision of my agency, S&S Heroes—

name: Astosis
text:
I am now able to travel to other planets.
So, I decided to visit your city first.

name: Astosis
text: Why... you asked?

name: Astosis
text:
...More than anything,
I wanted to see your face directly.
Is that an insufficient reason?

name: Astosis
text:
Hehe, I got to see your surprised face.
Just that alone, it was worth the slight inconvenience.

name: Astosis
text:
...This is my first time visiting this city,
but it's a truly interesting place.

name: Astosis
text:
What we only see once a year on our planet...
The moon Luna, if I recall correctly.
It feels strange to see it every day—

name: Astosis
text:
And people from various planets casually
pass by and create a lively atmosphere.
To me, it's a continuous surprise.

name: Astosis
text:
And also, if I recall correctly...
You were enjoying various cultural festivals, weren't you?

name: Astosis
text:
It should be this time of year as well.
The name of the festival was...
What was it again?

name: Astosis
text:
Yes, Valentine's.
The meaning of giving chocolate is also...
well, of course, I've already investigated it.

name: Astosis
text: ...It's alright if I were to receive it, right?

name: Astosis
text: Thank you, I am truly happy to receive your feelings.

name: Astosis
text:
Hehe, this that I've prepared will also not go to waste.
Here, please accept it.

name: Astosis
text:
...Now, regarding the time after this.
I can flatter myself and assume
you've kept it open for me, can't I?

name: Astosis
text:
Shall we go, [Player]-kun?
First, for a meal—

name: Astosis
text: Oh, the wind has picked up.

name: Astosis
text:
[Player]-kun, over here.
This coat should serve as a windbreak for you.

name: Astosis
text:
Hehe, it's a bit embarrassing,
but tonight, I'll escort you like this.

name: Astosis
text: ...No objections, yes?
